black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) standing outside a large, heavy wooden door with a sign that says 'PRINT SHOP.' (Character) looks hesitant, peeking around the doorframe. (Character) is wearing a crown and a simple adventure dress.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The King looking worried, talking to (character). (Character) looks determined. (Character) is holding up a special 'Brave Tool'—a sparkling, rainbow-colored ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The inside of a print shop. Big, complicated machines with gears and rollers loom over tiny (character). Steam comes out of one machine. (Character) looks small but is walking forward.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A round, messy monster made entirely of dripping ink blobs. It has a goofy, naughty grin. There are splashes on the floor around it. (Character) is pointing a ruler at it.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A skinny, jagged goblin made of crumpled paper and tape. It is holding a stack of shiny books (the Proofs) in its crinkly claws. (Character) looks angry and brave.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Character) using a ruler to straighten a piece of paper. The Ink-Blob and Paper-Jam monsters look sad and defeated, shrinking away into a dark corner.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Character) hugging a large stack of glowing, perfect books. (Character) has a big smile on (Character)'s face. The machines in the background look quiet now.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A triumphant scene. (Character) holding the books high in the air. The King is clapping, and cute castle animals are cheering around (character). The sun is shining brightly.
